info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued August 9 at 4:28PM MDT until August 9 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... North central Hidalgo County in southwestern New Mexico...
* Until 530 PM MDT.
* At 428 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was over Lordsburg.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong winds up to 45 mph.
SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists via NMDot road camera livestream.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 16 and 31.
Locations impacted include... Lordsburg and Shakespeare.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 5:30 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 5:30 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 5:30 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 5:30 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
